message: “This is happening in our community. It’s happening to our young women and young men. Human trafficking is growing, it is a billion-dollar industry, and it will continue to be an issue unless we address it”

data.description: GREENSBORO, N.C. -- We're hearing about human trafficking more frequently in the state and in the Piedmont Triad. It's a crime law enforcement are starting to learn more techniques about how to fight and using new methods to do it. Human trafficking is when someone is forced into labor or forced to....
data.title: Local group addresses human trafficking in the Piedmont Triad
